name: Loxley
overview: 830 years ago, Richard "the Lionheart", King of England, went to the Third Great Crusade to reclaim the Holy Land. Robin of Loxley, one of the loyal noblemen marching under the King's banner, survived the war and managed to return home. Upon arrival, he found his father murdered and his properties confiscated by the wicked Sheriff of Nottingham, who has taken advantage of the abscense of the King to increase his power. Avowing to avenge his father and fight the tyrant Sheriff, Robin was forced to become an outlaw. He founded the Thieves School to train a rebel force in Sherwood Forest. Upon learning of the rising rebel force in Sherwood, the Sheriff, in a fit of rage, kidnapped Lady Marian, Robin's one true love. Robin must prepare to infiltrate Nottingham Castle in order to stop the Sheriff from marrying her, and to seek revenge for the injustices served upon him.
